com.mygdx.game

Class ButtonAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.ButtonAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aurelienribon.tweenengine.TweenAccessor<com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.TextButton>

    public class ButtonAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements aurelienribon.tweenengine.TweenAccessor<com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.TextButton>
    Tween Accessor for Text Buttons Essentially, tween engine works by looking at the current value of a property, incrementing it closer to the target using a formula (tween equations), and then stopping when reaching the target. This allows for very smooth animation to be possible.
